contentfulProduct.seoDescription: A 21st century much-needed piece, the Phone Crossbody bag is comfortable and perfectly roomy. Adjustable strap, made with a folded feature and lined with pockets for your cards.
contentfulProduct.title: Italian Pebbled Leather Phone Crossbody

content.value: A 21st century much-needed piece, the Phone Crossbody bag is comfortable and perfectly roomy. Adjustable strap, made with a folded feature and lined with pockets for your cards.
Materials: Made from the finest Italian top-grain calfskin leather
When dirty, give it a quick wipe with a soft dry cloth; with it you can use some leather cleansing cream or a small amount of water; let water spills dry naturally.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Size: 4.75" L x 6.75" H
  • Strap: Adjustable leather strap
  • Materials: Made from the finest Italian top-grain calfskin leather
  • Hardware: snap closure
  • Interior: Credit card pockets
  • Origin: Florence, Italy

productDescription.productDescription: A 21st century much-needed piece, the Phone Crossbody bag is comfortable and perfectly roomy. Adjustable strap, made with a folded feature and lined with pockets for your cards.

reviews.body: This sweater is my favorite now!

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
